mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (menu_name, menu_price, menu_info, menu_origin, menu_picture, menu_category_no) VALUES ( #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuInfo}, #{menuOrigin}, COALESCE(#{menuPicture},null), #{menuCategoryNo} )
mapper.select: select menu_picture from menu where menu_no = #{menuNo}

select menu_no menuNo, menu_name menuName, menu_price menuPrice, menu_info menuInfo, menu_origin menuOrigin, menu_picture menuPicture, menu_category_no menuCategoryNo from menu where menu_no = #{menuNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_price = #{menuPrice}, menu_info = #{menuInfo}, menu_origin = #{menuOrigin}, menu_picture = COALESCE(#{menuPicture},null), menu_category_no = #{menuCategoryNo} WHERE menu_no = #{menuNo}
